Text: Thanks. I haven't seen this in real 3D since 1954. The picture make not make much sense, but it makes NO sense except in 3D. I've seen it many times in 2D but the 3D version is twice as exciting. If some of the other 3D films of the 50s have been as well preserved, we have a lot to look forward to. Hitchcock's "Dial M for Murder" is out. Bring on "It Came From Outer Space"!
